last_episode_to_air.name: Home Flea
last_episode_to_air.overview: A strong showbiz flea wants to retire and he comes across Pixie and Dixie, and they send him inside of Jinks' fur.

name: Pixie and Dixie and Mr. Jinks
original_name: Pixie and Dixie and Mr. Jinks
overview: Pixie & Dixie and Mr. Jinks is a Hanna-Barbera cartoon that featured as a regular segment of the television series The Huckleberry Hound Show from 1958 to 1961.

episodes.name: Cousin Tex
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie get a visit from their cousin Tex, who decided to take on Mr. Jinks.

episodes.name: Judo Jack
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie bring in a martial arts expert, Judo Jack, to help them take on Mr. Jinx.

episodes.name: Kit Kat Kit
episodes.overview: Jinks makes a robot cat to help him get rid of Pixie and Dixie.

episodes.name: Jinks' Mice Device
episodes.overview: Mr. Jinks develops a device that makes Pixie and Dixie invisible.

episodes.name: Pistol Packin' Pirate
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie find themselves on board a pirate ship, with Mr. Jinks serving as first mate.

episodes.name: Scaredycat Dog
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie buy a guard dog to protect them from Mr. Jinks, but it turns out that he's afraid of cats!

episodes.name: Little Bird-Mouse
episodes.overview: Despite the protestations of his school teacher, Dixie learns how to flap his ears and fly.

episodes.name: Jiggers… It’s Jinks!
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie has a sweet home in a cheese warehouse with Mr. Jinks as the guard, but wish for him back when a tougher guard cat gets hired.

episodes.name: The Ghost with the Most
episodes.overview: Mr. Jinks thinks he has killed Dixie, so Dixie disguises himself as a ghost to scare him into obedience.

episodes.name: The Ace of Space
episodes.overview: Jinks wants to pretend he's an outer space visitor to scare Pixie and Dixie, until a real alien lands in his backyard.

episodes.name: Jinks Junior
episodes.overview: Jinks tries to teach his young son how to catch mice, but he would rather be friends with them.

episodes.name: Jinks The Butler
episodes.overview: Jinks  is a butler for a fancy dinner party, who only has to keep the two mice from invading the dinner.

episodes.name: Jinks' Flying Carpet
episodes.overview: Jinks receives a magic carper from a far off relative which makes it easier for him to chase Pixie and Dixie.

episodes.name: Puppet Pals
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie create a puppet of Mr. Jinks to confuse a dog who has taken his side.

episodes.name: Mark of the Mouse
episodes.overview: Both Pixie and Dixie and Mr. Jinks love the TC show "Mark of the Mouse", a Zorro-like mouse hero. So Pixie disguises himself as the Mark in order to get Mr. Jinks.

episodes.name: Dinky Jinks
episodes.overview: Jinks heads to the laboratory and creates a potion that makes him the same size as Pixie and Dixie.

episodes.name: Hypnotize Surprise
episodes.overview: Dixie learns about hypnosis and uses a twirling watch to make Mr. Jinks think he's a dog, a bird and a mouse.

episodes.name: Nice Mice
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie find that they need to be nice to a cat when they find an abandoned kitten in the yard.

episodes.name: King-Size Surprise
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie help a dog hook his license tag out of the sewer, who then becomes their protector against Mr. Jinks.

episodes.name: Cat-Nap Cat
episodes.overview: Mr. Jinx only wants to take a short nap but, of course, Pixie and Dixie don't want him to.

episodes.name: Mouse-Nappers
episodes.overview: Mr. Jinks finds himself in competition with another cat in his quest to catch Pixie and Dixie.

episodes.name: Boxing Buddy
episodes.overview: Mr. Jinks discovers a new kind of mouse in the form of a boxing kangaroo.

episodes.name: Sour Puss
episodes.overview: Jinks seeks revenge on a butler when he loses his job.

episodes.name: Rapid Robot
episodes.overview: Jinks makes a robot to go after Pixie and Dixie.

episodes.name: King Size Poodle
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie's life is dull. A lion runs away from the zoo when a door is left open. The police are looking for the lion everywhere. He persuades the boys to hide him. They clip off his hair to make him look like a big poodle. They disguise him without Jinks knowing.

episodes.name: Hi Fido
episodes.overview: Dixie uses a ventriloquism book and uses his ventriloquism on a hi-fi set and does a imitation of a dog barking that scares Jinks.

episodes.name: Batty Bat
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie's cousin- who's a bat-mouse- comes for a visit. Because he flies, he can out-maneuver Jinks as he gets food for Pixie and Dixie.

episodes.name: Mighty Mite
episodes.overview: Pixie, Dixie and Jinks meets a short boxing rooster named El Puncho who keeps punching Jinks and throwing him out the house and a dog keeps wanting Jinks to get back at him.

episodes.name: Bird Brained Cat
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie try and help Mr. Jinks survive a bout of canaryitis when the neighbors' bird comes to stay while they are away.

episodes.name: Lend-Lease Meece
episodes.overview: Jinks lends Pixie and Dixie out to Charlie, but a feud erupts. Then a hobo mouse steps in and wins the heart of the new cat who adopts him.

episodes.name: A Good Good Fairy
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie discover they have a fairy who speaks with a whistle and she grants them wishes.

episodes.name: Heavens to Jinksy
episodes.overview: After a hit on the head, Jinks gets knocked out. A mysterious voice tells him to be nice to Pixie and Dixie if he wants to go "up." He agrees, and Jinks finds that being nice is much harder and more painful than he thought.

episodes.name: Goldfish Fever
episodes.overview: Jinks becomes obsessed with the fish next door and Pixie and Dixie must try to stop him.

episodes.name: Pushy Cat
episodes.overview: An old friend of Mr. Jinks comes by and wants to eat Pixie and Dixie, so he tries to knock out Mr. Jinks.

episodes.name: Puss in Boats
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie packs up and leave the house because of the way Jinks treats them; Jinks follows them onto a ship where a French cat wants to keep Pixie and Dixie for himself and Jinks attempts to rescue and bring them back home.

episodes.name: High Jinks
episodes.overview: Jinks tries to shoot Pixie and Dixie to the moon, but sends them over to a cheese factory. The mice are convinced they are on the moon.

episodes.name: Price for Mice
episodes.overview: Jinks is reading the paper and finds an ad that pays for white mice, so he tricks Pixie and Dixie to paint themselves white.

episodes.name: Plutocrat Cat
episodes.overview: Fed up with Jinks, Pixie and Dixie move in with the rich cat next door, but they don’t find much happiness.

episodes.name: Pied Piper Pipe
episodes.overview: Jinks tries to get his mind off those meeses, so he decides to read the book "The Pied Piper", and gets the idea of using the pipe to tame Pixie and Dixie.

episodes.name: Woo for Two
episodes.overview: Jinks falls head-over-heels in love with a cute cat next door, but realizes she's in love with another cat.

episodes.name: Party Peeper Jinks
episodes.overview: It's Jinks' birthday. Pixie and Dixie come to sing him a birthday song. Jinks doesn't like songs. They give him a card. Jinks doesn't like cards. Jinks says that he only likes presents, yes, presents. He wants only his cat friends at his birthday, so he throws Pixie and Dixie out of the house.

episodes.name: A Wise Quack
episodes.overview: Yakky tries to win his way into Pixie, Dixie and Jinks's home. With the mice, it's easy... but Mr. Jinks's heart, now that's another story.

episodes.name: Missile Bound Cat
episodes.overview: Pixie and Dixie meets their favorite T.V. hero, Space Cat. The space hero swings by their home to teach Mr. Jinks a lesson.

episodes.name: Kind to Meeces Week
episodes.overview: Since it's their week to celebrate, all the little mice come out to play. Jinks doesn't want to be kind to Pixie and Dixie. He does not believe in holidays.

episodes.name: Crew Cat
episodes.overview: Jinks tricks Pixie and Dixie to board onto a ship so he can get a free trip as the ship's new cat to get rid of mice when one of his friends get fired from the job.

episodes.name: Jinxed Jinks
episodes.overview: After getting a insurance policy on Pixie and Dixie, Jinks sees if anything will happen to Pixie and Dixie, but nothing happens for two weeks, so his conscience tells him to pull accidents on them, but they backfire on him.

episodes.name: Light Headed Cat
episodes.overview: Mr. Jinks applies for a job as a scientifically minded cat for a pioneering position in a space project, but little does he know he'll have to be gravity resisted for the outer space project.

episodes.name: Mouse for Rent
episodes.overview: Jinks gets a wild idea by giving Pixie and Dixie away to other cats so they can keep their homes and chasing them out.

episodes.name: Jinks’ Jinx
episodes.overview: Howard the Cat comes over to visit Jinks and they reminisce how fun it was back in the old days chasing mice, so they go after Pixie and Dixie. Pixie and Dixie make believe by convincing Jinks that Howard is bad luck since he's a black cat and they make accidents happen to Jinks.

episodes.name: Fresh Heir
episodes.overview: Jinks has inherited from Mrs. Smithers an old mansion and moves there, leaving Pixie and Dixie behind. The two mice make the place haunted to scare Jinks into going back home.

episodes.name: Strong Mouse (Hercules)
episodes.overview: When the neighborhood's head cat, Gus and his hench-cats think Jinks has been getting chummy with Pixie and Dixie, he tells Jinks to get more meaner and tougher on them and rough them up; Pixie and Dixie's cousin comes for a visit and poses as Pixie and roughs up on Jinks.

episodes.name: Bombay Mouse
episodes.overview: Tabu, a mouse from Bombay visits Pixie and Dixie to learn the ways of American mice, but he first works a little magic on Jinks.

episodes.name: Mouse Trapped
episodes.overview: Jinks makes a mechanical female mouse to tear apart Pixie and Dixie.

episodes.name: Magician Jinks
episodes.overview: Jinks makes Pixie and Dixie disappear with the help of a magic book, but when he tries to bring them back, he creates a monster that chases him off.

episodes.name: Meece Missiles
episodes.overview: Jinks is fed up when Pixie and Dixie left their mouse hole without his permission, so he gets a idea to send them away. He promises them a fun ride for themselves, but instead he tricks Pixie and Dixie for the ride and he sends them away flying through the city in a basket stringed up to a balloon and they get mistaken for creatures in a flying saucer.

episodes.name: Homeless Jinks
episodes.overview: Jinks loses his job and Pixie and Dixie tries to get his job back by sending in tons of mice.

episodes.name: Home Flea
episodes.overview: A strong showbiz flea wants to retire and he comes across Pixie and Dixie, and they send him inside of Jinks' fur.

episodes.name: Jinks’ Jinx
episodes.overview: Howard the Cat comes over to visit Jinks and they reminisce how fun it was back in the old days chasing mice, so they go after Pixie and Dixie. Pixie and Dixie make believe by convincing Jinks that Howard is bad luck since he's a black cat and they make accidents happen to Jinks.
